content: आविद्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Pierced, bored, rent, splintered, broken down; उत्पाताविद्धमूर्तिः <ls>Mv. 5. 44</ls> rent or contracted; <ls>R. 12. 73.</ls> {@--2@} Curved, crooked, uneven; <ls>V. 4. 28</ls>; हर्षाविद्धमभ्युत्थितः <ls>Dk. 37.</ls> {@--3@} Cast with force; दूरनिक्षेप° <ls>Māl. 8</ls> cast forth in taking long strides; <ls>Mv. 2</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 40</ls>; thrown, put in motion. {@--4@} Disappointed. {@--5@} Fallacious, false. {@--6@} Stupid, foolish.
